events.title: Water Rocket Launch
events.description: A thrilling competition where teams designed, built, and launched water-powered rockets. Test your engineering skills and compete for glory!

events.title: Cubesat Showcase
events.description: Experience our latest CubeSat technology demonstration and learn about satellite systems and space exploration.

events.title: SAST Damru Exhibit
events.description: A unique exhibit showcasing scientific wonders and innovative projects from SAST members.

events.title: Club Onboarding 2025
events.description: Welcoming space enthusiasts to SAST Club. Join us to explore opportunities in space technology and astronomy!

events.title: Guest Lecture - Dr. Rajkumar Vedam
events.description: Insights from Dr. Vedam on future space advancements, satellite technology, and career opportunities in aerospace.

events.title: Tsuchinshan Comet Spotting
events.description: Observe celestial phenomena in real-time. Join us for an unforgettable night of comet watching and stargazing.

events.title: SAST Official Launch
events.description: Inaugurating SAST's journey and vision. A historic moment marking the beginning of our space exploration endeavors.

events.title: Annual Astronomy Quiz 2025
events.description: Test your knowledge of astronomy, space science, and astrophysics in this exciting quiz competition with amazing prizes!

events.title: Rocket Propulsion Workshop
events.description: A comprehensive 3-day workshop on rocket propulsion systems, engine design, and practical applications in space technology.

events.title: Satellite Hackathon 2025
events.description: 48-hour hackathon focused on satellite communication, data analysis, and space technology innovations. Form teams and compete!
